[h1]Для настоящих любителей хардкора!!![/h1]
Даа, детка - это то, что нужно. Не буду особо много строчить, опишу лишь плюсы и минусы игры:
[h1] Плюсы:  [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Невероятная харкорность.
    [*]Перки, которые поддаются прокачке, что делает игру увлекательнее.
    [*]Разнообразие классов.
    [*]Великолепный баланс.
    [*]Приятная стрельба из оружия, отдача прям чувствуется. Это не передать на словах.
    [*]Отличное драйвовое музыкальное сопровождение.
    [*]Широкий выбор уровней сложности - от "легкий" до "Hell on Eath" (последнее в прямом смысле слова).
    [*]Функциональные настройки сетевой игры.
    [*]Огромное количество различных DLC.
[/list]
[h1] Минусы:  [/h1]
[list]
    [*]Враги иногда спавняться чуть ли не на вашем персонаже.
    [*]Прыжок чуть ли не самое бессмысленное действие в игре - прыгает очень низко (но на некоторых картах...Гг)
    [*]На некоторых картах слегка фризит даже на ТОПовых ПК.
[/list]

Даже не знаю, что сюда можно было бы добавить еще. Советую всем опробовать игру.
Очень интересная игра жанра Horror, этим же могу сказать, что игра вас порадует.

Not a bad co-op horror shooter if you can get it on sale.  
Killing Floor 2 has been announced but at this time there is no release date.  This game might tie you over until then. 

It's a bloody wave-shooter against hordes of bad AI at it's core but thankfully the devolpers and modders have taken this game beyond that... at least a little bit.   There are now missions with objectives although they are a bit primitive.  

Blasting Zed's apart with a wide range of weaponry along side your friends is quite enjoyable.  Even solo play is good for when you want to unwind a bit. 

FYI: this game still uses the counter strike physics of "you run faster with a knife" instead of a sprint button.  Really odd to me, but its still fun.  
 
Also maps with open spaces = more time to aim and shoot = living longer and not getting ganged up if you are a new player.

Amazing game, fun as hell to play, lots of teamwork based gameplay, players are friendly, and you'll always find people willing to play.


10/10 - Amazing for the price!

Killing Floor has the best gun play I've ever experienced in FPS. The guns feel amazing in this game. It's a co-op zombie shooter and it's really fun.

Get it and you will not be disappointed, I promise! :)

[h1]Components[/h1]
+ You have to respect this is a game released nearly 5 years ago, where graphics hadn’t reached GTA V or Battlefield 4. But Killing Floor isn’t about having a beautiful game but the beautiful killing. The zombies look very creatively made and scary. Designed uniquely and different from one another makes it amazing. And the maps look amazing as well, West London is my favourite and it really displays the aftermath of the outbreak setting well. The developers know how to make something look like it had just experienced a zombie outbreak. And the weapons are very interesting, some look like normal weaponry, and then there are the more creative guns, like the Zed Gun, which was literally developed and designed to kick zombie ass, and it looks like it would too.

+ Gameplay is outstanding. It is because of the gameplay that makes the game so enjoyable with mates. You need to work together to defeat stronger enemies, and sometimes you need to whip out the knife and just run to the hills. And when you run out of ammo, you scream for help. There are so many situations you can get into that make the game so enjoyable, whether or not your teammates help you. The healing mechanism gives you more to look out for, the second you run low, you need to inject yourself and heal. Because it is a wave game, you need to last long. Then there are classes, which diversify each other and players. Medics can heal you with guns and quicker. Then there are commandos, which are better with rifles. Then there are marksmen, which do shittons of damage with these weapons against the head. There is just so many good things about the gameplay.

+ The sound is great, just plain great. Since Killing Floor is set in England, it makes the game slightly funny to a lot of people, especially Americans. As they “talk funny” and you need to share your “dosh”. And the voice acting is just amazing, the things each unique character say is funny, even the robot talks. The shopkeeper always has something weird to say when the store opens or closes.

+ Gamemodes, this is the tricky part as there are two, normal waves of zombies, in which you can customize the amount of rounds and difficulty. There is an objective mode, which is curious, it tells you to do all these objectives while fending off zombies. It is not played frequently, but normal killing floor of killing waves of zombies is very enjoyable. It is not the gamemode of the game that is supposed to be fun; it is the gameplay of the game.

+ Unique, there are games out there about fending off waves of zombies but KF pulls it in a different direction whereas it is humorous and fun. It has a lot of different components, like a shopkeeper and you can share cash. And unique classes that you can level up the more you play it. But you cannot achieve the same level of fun playing alone, this game [b] requires [/b] friends.

[h1][b]Warning:[/b] Deep Overview[/h1]
This game. So many memories of me and my friends. Much like Left 4 Dead 2, it is an incredibly fun Co-op game to play with friends, which is easy to abuse as a means to troll and have fun in various ways. 

It has a simple mission, last this many rounds and kill the boss, GGWP. But that is not the point of the game. Much like everything else in life, it is the journey that makes anything notable. The experience along the way, in Killing Floor, when you play with friends, hours and hours. 

You will cry, laugh, rage, joy, sadden, shock, every emotion. The connection made between you and your friends will determine the outcome of your story, whether you will rage against them for not helping you and decide to face the boss alone, or learn to work together to take down a common enemy as you know that you cannot achieve everything alone, everyone needs a little help, you might need to share money, or have a mate be a healer to heal everyone during a round, or work together to have combined firepower to overwhelm the boss. 

Because you will not only learn in the Floor, but in life, not everything can be achieved alone, that is what teammates, friends, and family are for, to be with you until the end. 

Also an amazing British Simulator. 9.5/10 - God's not here, You save the queen.

I strongly recommend this game to those who love to play coop games with a lot of your mates and are looking for a lot of fun and good times.

Clot — Сын Кевина. Обычный зомби. Встречается уже в самом начале игры.

Bloat — Толстый зомби , который плюется кислотой. Встречается в самом начале игры.

Crawler — Человек-Паук. Быстрый и прыгучий . Встречается чуть позже начала игры.

Gorefast — Немного измененный Clot. Довольно быстрый , а так же умеет размахивать своим мечем. Встречается в начале игры.

Stalker — Зомби-невидимка. Любит подкрадываться и наносить неожиданные атаки. Встречается уже в середине игры.

Husk — Зомби-Огнеметчик. Обожает хорошо прожаренных людей >:D. Встречается в начале игры.

Siren — Жена Кевина. Её крик заставляет всю взрывчатку взрываться , а так же просто режет уши своим криком выжившим. Встречается в середине игры.

Scrake — Очень сильный мутант с бензопилой. Встречается в середине или ближе к концу игры.

Fleshpound — Машина убийства! От выстрелов слабых орудий приходит в ярость и убивает ВСЁ , что стоит у него на пути!

Patriarch — Кевин Кламели. «Бог» всех этим мутантов. Вооружен ракетометом и пулеметом. Если вы плохо вооружены — вам конец.
Интересная игра.

Well after uninstalling and reinstalling the game as well as following various online help guides telling me which files i should delete and verify for several hours, i finally managed to get this game working long enough to play one round. That one round was very fun, combat is balanced and weapons are satisfying, overall the gameplay during that one round was good. So if you want to pay 20 dollars for a couple hours of sorting through error messages for the chance to play a good 20 minutes of shooting zombies, Killing Floor is just what you are looking for.

Although this is not very polished, it is extremely entertaining fo r what it is. I very much recommend playing it with friends although it is possible to play offline, or log onto servers by yourself. This is definitely recommended. Killing Floor удивительная игра, которая поразила тем, что выделилась среди прочих зомби шутеров.
Игра может напоминать left 4 dead, но механика зомби другая. Никакого крошилова, только продуманная тактика выживания. Прячся, подстерегай игроков, побывай в шкуре зомби.
Сюжета как такового нет, игра является своего рода ареной с разными целями: 
1.Остаться единственных выжившим.2.Пережить N-ое колличество волн зомби.
Рекомендую для игры с друзьями.

This game is starting to show it's age now graphics wise; but is still plenty of fun. I bought this game after release and still play it from time to time. Controls are great, weapons are fun , nothing like playing against waves of zombies with groups of other people. The weapons class system keeps the game play interesting for extened periods of time while you try and level up to increase your skills. It's a great zombie killing game online.

Can't wait for Killing floor 2, it looks to have much more zombie gore and has more points of damage against zombies.

A FPS co-op survival game.
The game may sound boring if you can't manage it, but it provides lots of different combinations of maps, player professions and zeds (zombies). If you become familiar with the maps and such and have friends to cooperate with, it's quite easily to get hooked into the game.
Playing solo can be quite difficult and frustrating.
Recommended for online co-op play!

This game is made for people who like wave zombie survival, the different types of Zed that come during the waves make it a real experience to face especially on Hard difficulty or above. Great game to play coop with some friends since it has many classes and players will benefit of having different classes on a party especially in high difficulties. For those who complain about dlc well this game makes it completely free to get different maps to play on since they continually update it with new maps and a workshop where you can get mods and new maps.
Whether you are alone or with some friends it can still be a fun experience.

If you like wave-based FPS games where you can purchase better weaponry between rounds, Killing Floor most likely has your name on it. Besides having a solid arsenal, there are some fearsome and gruesome enemies to be fought. 

Killing Floor takes place in England. Some scientists were toying with human tissue and ended up by mistake making zombie specimens. There are two types of modes in Killing floor : Killing Floor and Objective. Killing Floor mode is a horde defense type game. After every successful round, the player is allowed to upgrade buy more ammo for their arsenal. Every kill will equal more money for disposable income. Every new level becomes more difficult until the final boss appears. In objective mode, there are specific challenges that players need to pass against certain zombies. To win a round, at least one player needs to remain alive to win. 

There are a lot of categories of weapons (or perks) to choose from as well as specific weapons. The categories are melee, pistols, support, commando, sharpshooter, firebug, demolition, field medic, berserker, perk neutral, and non-damaging. Melee weapons range from knives (almost spelt knifs), machetes, fire axes, katanas, chainsaws, claymores, sytches and a dwarves axe. Pistols range from regular 9mm to dual handcannons. Support comes in the form of shotguns, impalers, a "zed" thrower and a AA12. Commando weapons include bullpup, AK-47, M4 carbine, tommy gun, MKb and SCAR's. Sharpshooter weapons include lever-action rifle, single piston long musket, compound crossbow, M14 EBR and M99 AMR. Firebug guns include Mac-10, trenchgun, flare revolver and flamethrower. Demolition weapons include L.A.W, grenade launcher, seeker six, M4 203 with grenade attachment, Harpoon Bomber, m79 grenade launcher, orca bomb propeller, pipe bomb and grenade. Field medic weapons include Mp7, Mp5, M7A, Schneidzekk and the blower thrower bile launcher. There is a single berserker weapon which includes a buzzsaw bolt. Neutral perks include a zed eradication device as well as a MKII version and finally, non damaging weapons include medical syringes and a welder. You're probably wondering what the heck is a welder doing in the game? The welder can sort of "lock" or weld doors shut in the game. The AI is smart though and will take a different route in a certain door is locked. To un-weld a door, simply press alt+fire. Each perk is selected at the beginning of the round and can level up. 

Graphically, the engine is nice and the dismemberment of the hordes is awesome. Sounds are pretty decent and provide for a nice ambience. Some of the screams that come from the infected specimens is quite chilling. 

Overall, a pretty good game if you're hardcore into FPS, zombie and horde type genre. I have quite a few friends that do not like the game due to it's type but the mods can keep you coming back for more.

Советую эту игру все любителям кс, Left 4 dead и прочих стрелялок. В игре есть множество: неплохой графон, мультиплеер, возможность играть с друзьяшками и многоооо зомби. В игре даже присутсвтует выбор между классами. В том чесле снайпер и берсерк и  др. В целом игра немного напонимает Left 4 dead но лучше. Независима от доната, что тоже весьма важно в наши дни. Ведь сейчас без доната никуда (кроме майнкрафта). И если вы играете в доту и не знаете, как оторваться - смело покупайте эту игру! Советую всем.
